data.message:
Isn't this post nice. just take a careful look what is said and done.
It's not just some fun and games, it's meant literally, as you see it.
No I'm not paranoid, Christmas will be dead and gone in 10 years time if people Don't wake up.

replies.message: I would be glad if Christmas is dead. Happy Holidays to you.
it's hijacked pegan celebration anyway, but it's more about destroying Western world values and way of living.
Cian hahahaha, how did you made that conclusion?
can you shut the fuck up? nobody gives a fuck about what you think ty <3
Christmas is back to stay. And after the last 8 years I'm confident people will be paying much more attention to woe tries to destroy their country and culture. Sorry daddy didn't pay attention.
hollenberger shut the fuck up you to if you have nothing to add.
Are you serious? Christmas is gonna be gone? What are you on bath salts? So what's your proposed solution to this? How do we "wake up?" Do we gotta go to church or some shit?

Matthew, i feel more hopeful because of the power change in America, but have to understand not out of the woods yet.
This year people indeed did start to pay more attention what's going on Michael. It's unbelievable when you see the executive orders Obama has given.
Dagnis your right the left sjws are trying to shut down Christmas
